original_text: Then the woman came to Saul. She saw that he was very afraid. She said, ‘I have obeyed you, sir. I did what you asked me to do. I might have died because I did that.
korean_text: 그 여인이 사울에게 이르러 그가 심히 고통 당함을 보고 그에게 이르되 여종이 왕의 말씀을 듣고 내 생명을 아끼지 아니하고 왕이 내게 이르신 말씀을 순종하였사오니

sentences.original_text: Then the woman came to Saul
She saw that he was very afraid
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그가 매우 두려워하는 것을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: I did what you asked me to do
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 제게 하도록 요청한 것을 했습니다

sentences.original_text: I might have died because I did that
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇게 했기 때문에 저는 죽을 뻔했습니다
